p: Neuropsychiatric problems were detected in 4 patients in the IFN group. Two cases experienced severe agitation and two cases complained of mood swings (mostly depression). One of the patients with mood swings had a history of mild depressive disorder in past years. Out of 4 cases, two patients were in the hospital for nearly 1â€‰month. Neuropsychiatric side effects of IFN are unlikely to happen in short-term use. All patients received a psychiatric consult. According to the Naranjo score, IFN possibly and probably caused neuropsychiatric problems in three and one patients, respectively.
